title: Direction of magnetic field midway between wires

content.prompt: Two long, straight, horizontal wires, parallel to each other in the plane of the page, carry electric currents to the right, as shown in the figure above. What is the direction of the net magnetic field at point P midway between the two wires?

choices.label: Out of the plane of the page

topic.text: 12.3: Magnetic Fields of Current-Carrying Wires and the Biot-Savart Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
